resources.string: Important: This step will cancel the registration and ginlo will be reset.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while setting your status to absent. Please try again.
Your account was deleted. It is possible that your mobile number was used on another device. Do you wish to reset your account on this device?
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong on our end. Please try again.

As we've recently informed you, SIMSme (now ginlo) has been handed over to Brabbler AG. That's why we'd like to ask for your consent (a) to transfer your contract and (b) to transfer your inventory, traffic, and message data to Brabbler Secure Message and Data Exchange AG (Brabbler AG) so that you can continue to use the messenger without restriction and to the same extent.
Your consent is voluntary, but if you don't give this consent, sending messages will no longer be possible as of %1$s and your account will be deactivated by %2$s. Further information on consent and your rights can be found %3$s.
Thank you!
Your SIMSme Team
You\'d like to continue using SIMSme (now ginlo) in the future? We\'re happy about that! So, don\'t wait and switch to Brabbler AG now.
Haven\'t had time yet to give your consent? Please take some time to agree to the provider change to Brabbler AG in order to continue using SIMSme (now ginlo).

Please agree to the provider change to Brabbler AG. Otherwise, you\'ll no longer be able to send messages as of now. And that would be a real pity. If you no longer want to use ginlo, please create a backup of your data.
If you want to send messages again with ginlo or create a backup of your data, please agree to the transfer of your contract to Brabbler AG now.
Your consent to the transfer of your data is required so that you can continue to use the messenger without restriction.
Please agree to the provider change.
You\'ll need this key to import your backup later. Please keep it secure. Alternatively, you can use the QR code below.
The passwords don\'t match. Please try again.
You\'ll get a new ginlo ID.\nAll your existing chats, media, and contacts will be gone.
Create a new account and overwrite your existing one?
Now let\'s find your backup to get your existing content in here.
Please enter the password you defined when creating your backup.
You can keep using your existing account if you\'re still logged in to ginlo on another smartphone. Then you can back up your content there and get it in here. It works like this:
Here\'s the list of your backups.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while downloading your backup. Please try again.
Enter your backup password and a backup key here.
The backup feature is available from ginlo version 1.7. If you have an older version, please update it first.
Open ginlo on your old smartphone.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while syncing your contacts. Please try again.
An error occurred when restoring your backups. The reason for this is that the connection to the server was lost, or that the backup is too old.
Something went wrong while restoring your backup. Please try again.
Something went wrong while restoring your backup. Either it’s us or your internet connection. Please check and try again.
Something went wrong while restoring your backup. Please try again.
The backup file couldn\'t be unpacked. Please select a different backup.
The backup file couldn\'t be decrypted. The password may have been entered incorrectly. Please re-enter your password and start the restoration.
Looking for ginlo users in your address book...
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while finding your backup. Please try again.
It may take a few moments to import your backup depending on the speed of your internet connection.
Please tap the one you want to import.
Note: Only use \"Import Backup\" if you don\'t have access to ginlo Business on any other device.
You can set a password for backup recovery here. This password won\'t be stored. If you forget it, your backup cannot be imported. For this reason, don\'t forget your password.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while changing your e-mail address. Please try again.
The e-mail address has been changed.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while changing your mobile number. Please try again.
It is already registered in the ginlo account under this mobile number. Upon re-registering this will be overwritten. Do you wish to continue?
The mobile number has been changed.
Please enter your new mobile number.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while unsubscribing. Please try again.
All content is disabled. You\'ll no longer receive messages from this channel.
The content provider is responsible for all the content and any additional links in this channel. ginlo.net GmbH has no influence on this content.
Do you want to unsubscribe from this channel?
Do you want to deactivate the service?
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while loading the channel list. Please try again.
Channel may not have been updated. Communication with the server failed.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while loading the channel content. Please try again.
Unfortunately, there are no channels available for your language settings.
You\'ll need an internet connection to subscribe to a channel.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while subscribing. Please try again.

Welcome to the %1$s channel

We'll make sure you always stay up to date.

A few small tips:
- You can access the Channel menu via the icon at the top right.
- You can subscribe to new categories by clicking on "Information".
- When you deactivate "Sounds/Notifications", you'll no longer receive any push notifications for messages.
- Click and hold down on a message to forward this message

Have fun :-)
Please confirm that you want to clear this chat.
Do you want to clear this channel history?
Do you want to clear this group history?
Do you want to delete this chat?
Important: You can\'t receive any messages from this contact because this contact has been blocked.
Important: The chat partner has been blocked.
You can’t send messages in this chat as the chat partner is blocked.
This ginlo account is no longer available.\nHowever, you can still access the chat history.
There\'s no ginlo user with this mobile number.
Do you want to reject this chat request and block the contact?
Do you want to reject this group request?
Do you want to replace the existing text?
Please select one or more contacts before sending.
The signature of the message is invalid
The filename is too long. Please shorten it and try sharing the file again.
This file exceeds the supported size.
The file has either been locked by another application or no application could be found to display the file.
No application has been found for selecting a file.
The file will no longer be protected by ginlo.
Do you want to delete this group?
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while deleting the group. Please try again.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while removing the participant. Please try again.
Do you want to leave this group? All participants will be notified.
Do you want to delete this group? All participants will be notified that you deleted to group.
%1$s is now an admin of this group.
%1$s made %2$s an admin of this group.
%1$d participant(s) couldn\'t receive this message type because of an outdated ginlo version.
%1$s is no longer an admin of this group.
This group no longer exists – please create a new group.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while opening the attachment. Please try again.
The ginlo version of the recipient doesn\'t yet support this message type.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while muting this chat. Please try again.
You\'ll start receiving notifications again once the selected period is over. For more options to customize your chats, please head over to \"Settings > Chats\".
Unable to open the audio message.
No application has been found for selecting the file.
The file will no longer be protected by ginlo.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while forwarding your message. Please contact our Customer Care at support@ginlo.net.
Unable to access the download directory.
You can invite friends to ginlo if some are still missing. :-)
You can invite friends to ginlo if some are still missing. :-)
Synchronizing contacts with your address book...
You can\'t send a message to yourself.
There isn\'t enough information available to import the file.
No application has been found for sharing the file.
%1$s has signed back in to ginlo.\nHence, this chat has been closed.\nYou can start a new chat with this user.
We\'re sorry, but the video couldn\'t be recorded. Please try again.
This video is %1$d seconds too long. The maximum length of a video is %2$d seconds.
This file is corrupted or in the wrong format
One or more files couldn\'t be imported.
Not all files could be imported as the maximum number has been exceeded.
There is no text available to send.
The attachment is no longer available.
Decide whether other users can see your display name in push messages. Note: The user name is sent unencrypted.
Please select a date in the future. The time travel feature is still on our to-do list. ;-)
The self-destruct time is earlier than the sending time.
The image is no longer available
Touch the screen\nto display the image
The message is no longer available
Touch the screen\nto display the message
The video is no longer available
Touch the screen\nto play the video
The voice message is no longer available
Tap screen to play voice message
Select a date and a year.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while playing back the audio message. Please try again.
The audio message can\'t be sent because it is corrupted.
Still %1$s days to TEST -\nGet your license here
ginlo now offers you services as well.
This contact is no longer blocked
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while loading your contacts. Please try again.

Seems you're a ginlo pioneer...
so let's invite your friends to join you.

Just tap the top right and select "Invite a Friend".
You didn\'t give ginlo permissions to access your contacts, or there are no contacts in your address book at all.

Hello!

Join me on ginlo, the secure messenger for private and confidential communication - made & hosted in Germany. It's easy to use, fully encrypted, and there's no tracking, no profiling, no ads.

Download it here: ginlo.net/join

CU soon on ginlo,
Join me on ginlo, the WhatsApp alternative
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while validating your QR code. Please try again.
Please search directly by name, e-mail address, department, or ginlo ID
Join me on ginlo, the secure messenger for private and confidential communication - made in Germany. Download it here: ginlo.net/join
Sort list in descending alphabetical order
Sort list in ascending alphabetical order
The contact couldn\'t be added to the address book.
Send a message to this contact
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while creating your account. Please try again.
Unable to add all users to the group.
Please confirm that you want to delete this contact.
The message couldn\'t be removed from the server.
The time-delayed messages couldn\'t be removed from the server.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while saving your changes. Please try again.
Do you want to cancel the activation of your new device?
Is the device name below correct? And is the security number here and on the new device identical? Great, then confirm.
Perfect, it worked.\nGetting your data into the new device may take a few moments.
All data will be deleted when you log out.
Scan the activation code with your new device or type it in manually when logging in.
Please confirm that you want to delete this device.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while deleting the device. Please try again.
Log in with your registered mobile number or e-mail address and assign a device name.
This ginlo ID doesn\'t seem right. Please try again.
To get the code, open ginlo Business on an existing device and go to \"Settings > Devices > Add Additional Device\".
Something went wrong while activating your device. Please check the activation code and try again.
This QR code seems to be invalid. Please check you scanned the right one.
Please enter the activation code here.
Is the security number here and on your other device identical? Great, then confirm on your other device.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while loading your devices. Please try again.
What do you want to be notified of?

Yes, please notify me via ginlo as soon as there is news of my DHL parcels on occasions chosen by me. I agree that my consent to the fulfilment of the terms of my contract with DHL Paket GmbH will be passed onto them. I can at any time withdraw my consent to receive notifications on the occasions determined by me, either through the deactivation of the controls or in settings, by deactivating the entire service.
This mobile number isn\'t linked to a DHL customer account.
Please check that your mobile number has been entered correctly in your DHL customer details and is the same as the number of this smartphone.
We couldn\'t find a DHL customer account to match your mobile number %1$s.
No matching DHL customer account found
Register as a new customer with DHL so that you can receive notifications via ginlo.
This postcode doesn\'t match the DHL customer account.
We couldn\'t find a DHL customer account to match your mobile number and the postcode provided.
No matching DHL customer account found
Register as a new customer with DHL so that you can receive notifications via ginlo.
By accepting you agree that your mobile number will be passed onto DHL to check service availability. Your mobile number won\'t be retained by DHL or used for any other purpose.
From now on you can receive notifications of the delivery of your DHL parcels directly via ginlo. Simply activate the new service for your DHL customer account.
For identification, we need the postcode that you have given to DHL. You\'ll find it in your DHL customer account under \'My details\'.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while initializing the fingerprint sensor. Please try again.
Your license will expire in less than a week. Please request a license extension from your administrator.
Your license has expired. Please request a license extension from your administrator.
Even more features with the ginlo Business Messenger
Please enter the password to continue with the registration.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while creating the group. Please try again.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while creating the group. Please try again later.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while updating the group name and image. Please try again.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while updating the participants. Please try again.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while pairing the devices. Please try again.
The sending of location data has been prohibited by the administrator.
Copy and paste has been prohibited by the administrator.
Access to the camera has been prohibited by the administrator.
The saving of contacts has been prohibited by the administrator.
Administrator has denied access to the media.
Authorization failed. You may have added a new fingerprint.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while registering your device for the push notifications. Please restart the app and try again.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while transferring your encrypted contacts to the server. Please try again.
%1$d of %2$d encrypted contacts were transferred to the server
ginlo is a messenger service featuring a combination of the maximum possible degree of security and ease of use.
Brabbler AG guarantees the security of your data. Powered by Deutsche Post technology. With true end-to-end encryption and hosting in Germany.
Now set up your ginlo account and set your password. Your password isn\'t transmitted to us and cannot be reset. So make sure to remember it.
Please accept the Terms of Use
Please wait a moment while we create your account
Error validating security certificate. Please check to see if a new version of ginlo is available.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong. Either it\'s us or your internet connection. Please check and try again. Error code: AND-0029
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong. Either it\'s us or your internet connection. Please check and try again. (AND-0068)
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while determining your location. Please try again.
Location services are disabled. Please activate them so that you can share your exact location.
This login information doesn\'t seem right. Please try again.
This password doesn\'t seem right. You can try %1$d more times.
Loading company directory from the server …
Loading contact information from the server …
Preparing contacts for the private directory …
Transferring encrypted contacts to the server …
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while migrating the contacts. Please try again.
Search for contacts on the ginlo server
Do you want to search for the contact with ginlo or send an invitation?
The account was deleted. The application will be reset.
We were unable to recognize your account. Please re-register.\n\nNote: The confirmation code is only valid for 30 minutes.

Unfortunately, it wasn\'t possible to register the device for notifications. Please go to Settings/Energy-saving mode and make sure that the application is able to run in the background and then restart the application.
No compatible application has been found.
Your device is in energy-saving mode. You won\'t receive any notifications. Please deactivate energy-saving mode.
You can now activate the preview in push notifications. This will display messages decrypted in the preview. Security is higher when the preview is deactivated.
As the app has been closed, the login information is no longer available. You\'ll need to sign up again.
The e-mail address has been changed. This change must be confirmed.
The e-mail address has been changed but not yet verified. Do you want to do this now?
The mobile number has been changed. This change must be confirmed.
The mobile number has been changed but not yet verified. Do you want to do this now?
Access to your camera is needed to take pictures and share them with your chat partners. They\'ll be encrypted and always stay private.
Access to your contacts is needed to show you fellow users among your contacts. We never access their details in plain text.
Access to your location is needed to share it with your chat partners. Encrypted, of course.
Access to your local storage is needed to send attachments to your chat partners. They\’ll be encrypted and always stay private.
Access to your microphone is needed to share video and audio messages with your chat partners. They\\’ll be encrypted and always stay private.
Access to your local storage is needed to save attachments to your device. They\'ll be encrypted and always stay private.
ginlo needs permission to use your microphone. You can set this permission in your device\'s app settings.
If the preview function is deactivated, ginlo must be opened first to view the content of new messages. Security is higher in this case.
The e-mail address has been changed. Please confirm the new e-mail address.
The mobile number has been changed. Please confirm the new mobile number.
Thanks! You\'ll get a text from us in a second...
Thanks! You\'ll get an e-mail from us in a second...
We\'re looking forward to your rating. :-)
Pssst, how do you like ginlo?
Video recording stopped. The maximum file size for this video has been reached.
Once you\'ve received it, please enter your recovery code here.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while requesting the recovery code. Please try again.
This recovery code doesn\'t seem right. Please try again.
Please enter a valid business e-mail address.
Please enter your first and last name.
This e-mail address is already in use. Do you want to continue anyway?
Activating a private e-mail address also deactivates the e-mail directory. Do you want to continue?
Do you want to set a password?
Ask for Password at App Start
Before you start, please familiarize yourself with our Terms of Use.
I have read the Terms of Use and hereby agree with them.
Please enter the confirmation code we\'ve sent to %1$s.
The password prompt serves to ensure the security of your communication. Should the password be requested when unlocking ginlo?
Please set a password to protect your app.
Now please enter your mobile number.
Use a 4-digit number code instead of a password.
By continuing, you accept our Terms of Use.
Please enter your mobile number. It must contain at least 6 digits.
We have sent a confirmation code to %1$s.\n\nPlease enter the code to complete the registration process.
Please enter the confirmation code we\'ve sent to %1$s.
Please set a password for this installation. This password is also needed when importing a backup. Don\'t lose your password.
Let\'s start with your device password.
The passwords don\'t match. Please try again.
The PIN must consist of 4 characters.
Please enter a valid display name.
The password no longer meets the password guidelines. A new password must be set.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong on our end. Please contact our Customer Care at support@ginlo.net.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while removing the e-mail address. Please try again.
There is no e-mail address registered for this account.
The e-mail address can only be removed if a mobile number is available.
The e-mail address has been removed.
Do you want to remove your e-mail address from your account?
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while removing the mobile number. Please try again.
The mobile number can only be removed if an e-mail address is available.
No mobile number is registered for this account.
The mobile number has been removed.
Do you want to remove your mobile number from your account?
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while sending your message. Please try again.
You can’t send messages in this chat.
Search for a ginlo user by mobile number, e-mail address, or ginlo ID.
This is not a ginlo user.
Let\'s change that. :-) Send an invitation to %1$s now.
Let\'s change that. :-) Send an invitation to %1$s now.
Maybe a typo in \"%1$s\"? Then just go back and try again. Or do you want to invite contacts in your address book?
Please select which type of contact you want to send.

The e-mail address is in an incorrect format.

The administrator has stored a different mobile number.
There have been too many attempts to pair devices today. Please try again tomorrow.
Automatic registration failed. The license code is invalid. Error code: 0174

Error: The attachment has already been deleted.
You haven\'t activated an option and so won\'t receive any service notifications.
Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong on our end. Please try again.

ginlo encrypts all your messages in a secure and reliable manner as they travel from your device to the recipient\'s device — the messages can\'t even be read from our servers. ginlo also offers a number of other features that make your communication as secure as possible:
You have met in person and scanned the QR code
Your contact is using ginlo. Ask them.
You have already been in contact via ginlo.
The symbols indicate the status of your message
You\'ll be asked to enter the password after the app has been in the background for this number of minutes.
Determines how many minutes the program will be running in the background before it requests your password.
The backup password is only valid for newly created backups.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while creating your backup. Please try again.
Save your chat history and media in a backup. You can then restore your chats, contacts, and media if you lose your smartphone or change to a new one.
Please create your initial backup by tapping \"Create Backup Now\". You can then set an interval, so that your app is regularly backed up.
Set your password for saving backups.
This password encrypts your backup data.
Set whether ginlo should automatically create a backup of your account information. The backup will be stored securely on the server.
